title: (x) Ackerman Realty Property Management script - Shelley Allegro {David H}
content:
Hi all,

Upon first glance, you’d think this font was Edwardian Script, but it doesn’t match up. Can anyone out there ID this font please? Your efforts are greatly appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704191500im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Ackerman_logo_6603.gif)

 [‹ (x) Pimpjuice bling typeface - Shiraz {Kate McDonnell}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704191500/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44106 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Discover it" sans / script-like italic - Fedra Sans / ??? {Akira/???} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704191500/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44045 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tristamane

comments.content: You nailed it David. Thank you very much for your help. Cheers!
btw, setting scripts on an arc is a typogrpahic sin \>^{p)
